entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:50 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
